titles.title: Declaring the office of Speaker of the House of Representatives to be vacant.
Declaring the office of Speaker of the House of Representatives to be vacant.

action.text: QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE - Ms. Greene (GA) rose to a question of the privileges of the House and offered the resolution. The Chair directed the Clerk to report the resolution. Upon examination of the resolution, the Chair determined that the resolution did constitute a question of the privileges of the House.
Mr. Scalise moved to table the measure.

vote.text: On motion to table the measure Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 359 - 43, 7 Present (Roll no. 188).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
